articles.title: NDC Spokesman Blasts Park Geun Hye's "Dresden Declaration"
articles.content:
NDC Spokesman Blasts Park Geun Hye's "Dresden Declaration"
Pyongyang, April 12 (KCNA) -- During her German junket Park Geun Hye made public in Dresden a "three-point proposal to the north" which consists of "solution to humanitarian issues", "establishment of the foundation for improving people's livelihood for the common prosperity" and "recovery of homogeneity" and so on which were nothing but a medley.
					 A spokesman for the National Defence Commission of the DPRK released a statement Saturday clarifying its views and principled stand as regards the fact that the south Korean authorities are talking nonsense that they "expect" positive response from the DPRK to the "Dresden Declaration," which does not deserve even a passing notice.
					
					 The statement said:
					
					 First, the "Dresden Declaration" is nothing but a jargon let loose by a traitor to the nation as she was so servile as to peddle the internal issue of the nation in other country.
					
					 Park called on outsiders to help solve the issue of the territory and nation divided into two by foreign forces and vociferated about the application of mode of unification in which "one side is swallowed up and the other absorbs it" to the "unification" of the Korean peninsula. This was the daydream of a psychopath and a reckless behavior. 
					
					  Second, the "Dresden Declaration" is a nonsensical one made by an anti-reunification element who deceived the public with hypocrisy and deception as she offered no solution, ignorant of the present state of the north-south relations.
					
					 The "three-point proposal to the north" is all irrelevant and indifferent to the improvement and development of the north-south relations.
					
					 As far as the issue of solving the humanitarian issue is concerned, it called for putting on a "regular basis" the reunions of separated families and relatives to build "confidence" between the north and the south and "rendering nutritional aid to women in childbed and babies" to carve out a "future of unification" together with the world community.
					
					 Park should have studied the order of priority in the work for improving the north-south relations if she wished to talk about peaceful reunification, though belatedly.
					
					 Park described the "recovery of homogeneity" through "common prosperity" and "exchange" based on "aid" and "cooperation" of the international community as a priority task for mending the inter-Korean relations. Her assertion only self-exposed that she is no more than a blind person as she is politically ignorant and dull-witted and insensitive to realities.
					
					 What matters is that she desperately hurled mud at the DPRK with such lies as "pain" and "hunger" while crying out for "aid", "cooperation" and "exchange." 
					
					 Third, the "Dresden Declaration" is nothing but anti-reunification outpourings intended to improve her poor image in utter disregard of the interests of the country and the nation. 
					
					 The "Dresden Declaration" is no more than rubbish of the times as it is peppered with treachery, hypocrisy and anti-reunification intention too base to tout. 
					
					 As the south Korean authorities requested the DPRK to clarify its formal stand on the "Dresden Declaration", it would like to clarify the following principled stand on this occasion:
					
					 They should bear in mind that the tongue lashing of Park Geun Hye is the first root cause of deteriorating the north-south relations and beclouding the prospect of the nation. 
					
					  It is the unanimous view of the public that the north-south relations will be smoother than now only if Park keeps her disgusting mouth closed. 
					
					 Park should not use the worn-out signboard of "confidence" any longer to cover up her wicked intention. 
					
					 The word "confidence" should never be abused as a veil for covering the sinister intention of fostering distrust and inciting confrontation and deceiving the nation. 
					
					 Next, the south side should put an end to the anachronistic way of thinking and behavior sticking to the dark past. 
					
					 Nothing is more foolish and nonsensical than trying to bring back the inglorious past under the influence of "yusin" perfume. 
					
					 Park should not talk about "miracle of the Han Riverside" and the "then time of laying a strong foundation of economic growth" instead of mentioning her father's name in a manner of making distant allusion whenever an opportunity presents itself. 
					
					 She had better draw a lesson taught by the history in which one met a tragic death for trampling down the democracy and enforcing "yusin" dictatorship. 
					
					 She should clearly know that she may reduce Chongwadae to her tomb during her office and meet execution after the expiry of the term of her office, if she persistently behaves as now. 
					
					 She had better not waste time doing anything reckless but do anything helpful to the interests of the country and the nation and this would be more beneficial to prolonging her remaining days.

articles.title: DPRK Delegate Declares Its Stand on U.S. Nuclear Threat and Blackmail against It
articles.content:
DPRK Delegate Declares Its Stand on U.S. Nuclear Threat and Blackmail against It
Pyongyang, April 12 (KCNA) -- The U.S., that made and used nuclear weapons for the first time in the world and has stockpiled the nukes more than any other country in the world, is putting spurs to the modernization of nukes, obsessed with the anachronistic daydream, said the DPRK delegate, speaking at an annual meeting of the United Nations Disarmament Commission on April 7.
					 The DPRK is calling for dismantling all nukes all over the world, he noted, adding: It is possible to dismantle nukes only when the country, which has nukes more than any other country in the world, stops the modernization of nuclear weapons and the establishment of the MD system and sets an example in taking the lead in nuclear disarmament.
					
					 The prevailing situation on the Korean peninsula shows that the hostile policy and nuclear threat and blackmail against the DPRK by the world's largest nuclear weapons state have reached a more serious stage, he said, declaring the stand of the DPRK as follows:
					
					 Firstly, the U.S. should stop at once the joint military exercises on the Korean peninsula, aimed at posing nuclear threat and blackmail against the DPRK.
					
					 Secondly, the U.S. should not describe the DPRK's self-defensive countermeasures to cope with the U.S. nuclear threat and blackmail as a "provocation" and "threat".
					
					 The delegation of the DPRK expects the meeting will pay special attention to the cruel nuclear threat and blackmail against the DPRK by the world's largest nuclear weapons state for more than 6 decades.
					
					 The DPRK will continue working hard to denuclearize the Korean peninsula with a main emphasis on putting an end to the U.S. nuclear threat and blackmail against the DPRK.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un Receives Greetings from Myanmar President
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Receives Greetings from Myanmar President
Pyongyang, April 12 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, first chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK, received a message of greeting from Thein Sein, president of Myanmar, on April 4.
					 The message extended sincere felicitations and best wishes to Kim Jong Un and, through him, to the people of the DPRK on the auspicious occasion of April 15, the 102nd birthday of Kim Il Sung, eternal President of the DPRK.
					
					 The message sincerely wished Kim Jong Un good health and happiness and the DPRK steady progress and prosperity.

articles.title: Greetings to Kim Jong Un from Ugandan President
articles.content:
Greetings to Kim Jong Un from Ugandan President
Pyongyang, April 12 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, first chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK, received a message of greeting from Yoweri Kaguta Museveni, president of Uganda, on March 26. 
					 In the message the Ugandan President extended the warmest greetings to Kim Jong Un, the government and people of the DPRK on his own behalf and on behalf of the government and people of Uganda on the occasion of the 102nd birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung. 
					
					 Noting that Kim Il Sung dedicated himself to the hard-working Korean people, prosperity and socio-economic development of the DPRK all his life, the message highly praised his life and great exploits. 
					
					 It hoped that the good bilateral relations with Kim Jong Un, the government and people of the DPRK would continue to develop favorably. 
					
					 It wished Kim Jong Un good health and the Korean people sustainable prosperity.

articles.title: Greetings to Kim Jong Un from Tajik Political Party Leader
articles.content:
Greetings to Kim Jong Un from Tajik Political Party Leader
Pyongyang, April 12 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea, received a message of greeting from Sh. Shabdolov, member of the Parliament and chairman of the Communist Party of Tajikistan, on April 8. 
					 The message said:
					
					 The Central Committee of the Communist Party of Tajikistan extends sincere congratulations to you and all the Korean people on the occasion of the 102nd birth anniversary of Comrade Kim Il Sung, eternal President of the DPRK and leader of the Korean people. 
					
					 The whole life of the great Comrade Kim Il Sung serves as an example of the revolutionary struggle for the working people's happiness and victory of socialism for the members of the Communist Party of Tajikistan. 
					
					 The course of the revolutionary activities of Comrade Kim Il Sung clearly proved that even small countries can be freed from the oppression of the international imperialists led by the U.S. imperialists on the road of the struggle for socialism. 
					
					 The strong unity and the revolutionary faith of the people led by the great leader like Comrade Kim Il Sung provide a guarantee for the victory in the struggle. 
					
					 Comrade Kim Jong Un, we members of the Communist Party of Tajikistan sincerely wish you success in this struggle.

articles.title: Floral Baskets to Kim Jong Un
articles.content:
Foreigners, Overseas Koreans Arrive to Participate in Kimilsungia Festival
Pyongyang, April 12 (KCNA) -- Foreigners and overseas Koreans arrived here on Saturday to take part in the 16th Kimilsungia Festival.
					 They were Liu Chensheng, board director of the Shenyang Korean Economic and Trade Investment Consultative Co. Ltd, Wang Dongping, general manager of the Kimilsungia-Kimjongilia Greenhouse in Dandong, China, and Li Xiangjun, vice-president of the Azalea Branch of the China Flower Association, and their parties and Yang Hongzhun, general manager of the Kimilsungia-Kimjongilia Greenhouse in Hunchun, China.
					
					 Arriving here earlier were Choe Ryong Ho, vice-president of Yanbian University of Science and Technology of China, and his party and Bayartogtokh Enkhbayar, representative of the Mongolian Kimjongilia Association.

articles.title: Delegation of Workers' Party of Mexico Here
articles.content:
Delegation of Workers' Party of Mexico Here
Pyongyang, April 12 (KCNA) -- The delegation of the Workers' Party of Mexico headed by National Leader Alberto Anaya Gutierrez arrived here on Saturday on the occasion of the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung.

articles.title: IIJI Secretary General Here
articles.content:
IIJI Secretary General Here
Pyongyang, April 12 (KCNA) -- Kenichi Ogami, secretary general of the International Institute of the Juche Idea, and his party arrived here on Saturday on the occasion of the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung.

articles.title: Delegations, Delegates of Juche Idea Study Organizations Here
articles.content:
Delegations, Delegates of Juche Idea Study Organizations Here
Pyongyang, April 12 (KCNA) -- Delegations and delegates of Juche Idea study organizations arrived here on Saturday on the occasion of the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung.
					 They were a delegation of the Japanese National Liaison Council of Societies for the Study of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism headed by Director of the International Institute of the Juche Idea Takao Kamakura, delegation of the Bangladesh Institute of the Juche Idea led by General Secretary Sheikh Rafiqul Islam Bablu, delegation of the German Group for the Study of Works of Comrade Kim Il Sung and Comrade Kim Jong Il led by Daniel Heinz Werner Ernst Junker, delegation of the Society for the Study of Self-Reliance of Pakistan led by Ghazi Salah Uddin, Chairman of the Nigerian National Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea Alhassan Mamman Muhammad and his party, Director General of the African Regional Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea Henry Masiko, Chairman of the Bangladesh Self-Reliance Research Centre Garib Newas, Chairman of the Finnish National Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea Juha Kieksy, Director of the Central Standing Committee of the General Associati
					
					 on of Korean Residents in Japan Han Tong Song who is director of the International Institute of the Juche Idea.

articles.title: Overseas Koreans Arrive
articles.content:
Overseas Koreans Arrive
Pyongyang, April 12 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the Federation of Koreans in the U.S. led by Chairman Yun Kil Sang, a delegation of the Federation of Koreans in Australia headed by Mun Chang Su, secretary general of the Ocean Regional Committee for Implementing the June 15 Joint Declaration, and Ro Kil Nam, representative of Minjok Thongsin, an Internet newspaper of Koreans in the United States, and his party arrived here Saturday.
					 Also arriving here that day was a delegation of the General Association of Koreans in China led by Vice-Chairman Cha Sang Bo.

articles.title: Foreign Guests Pay Tribute to Statues of Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Foreign Guests Pay Tribute to Statues of Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
Pyongyang, April 12 (KCNA) -- The secretary general of the International Institute of the Juche Idea and his party, the delegation of the Japanese National Liaison Council of Societies for the Study of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism and participants in the IAAF-27th Mangyongdae Prize Marathon visited the statues of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il on Mansu Hill on Saturday on the occasion of the Day of the Sun (birth anniversary of Kim Il Sung).
					 They laid floral baskets before the statues and paid tribute to them.
					
					 On the same day, the delegation of the Tynda Group for the Study of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism of Russia, the delegation of the Kim Jong Suk Womenâ€™s Union of Russia and the delegation of the Far Eastern Association for the Study of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism of Russia paid tribute to the statues.

articles.title: Overseas Koreans Pay Tribute to Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Overseas Koreans Pay Tribute to Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
Pyongyang April 12 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the International United Confederation of Koreans placed bunches of flowers before the statues of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il on Mansu Hill on April 11 and paid tribute to them.

articles.title: Korean Student Wins Special Place at Int'l Concours
articles.content:
Korean Student Wins Special Place at Int'l Concours
Pyongyang, April 12 (KCNA) -- Student of the DPRK Han Il Yong took the special place at the Third International Concours "Mars" held in Moscow from March 22 to April 6. 
					 The concours brought together more than 140 youngsters aged 7 to 18 from various countries including the DPRK, Russia, Vietnam and Italy. They competed in instrumental music, vocal music, dance and creative skill according to their ages. 
					
					 Eight years old Han Il Yong made a debut in the international concours. He successfully performed piano suits requiring a high skill to win applause from its jury and experts. 
					
					 A special prize and special statuette were awarded to Han at the closing ceremony.

articles.title: Foreign Crewmen Meet
articles.content:
Foreign Crewmen Meet
Hamhung, April 12 (KCNA) -- There took place a meeting of foreign crewmen at Hungnam Port, South Hamgyong Province Saturday to mark the 102nd birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung (Day of the Sun).
					 Prior to the meeting, the participants laid bouquets before the statues of Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il in Hamhung City and paid tribute to them.
					
					 The captain and crewmen of the Sierra Leonean-flagged ship JIN ZHAO 11 were present at the meeting.
					
					 Speeches were made there.
					
					 The speakers said: The President founded the immortal Juche idea and led the revolution and construction to victory. His whole life was a brilliant one of a peerlessly great man who performed great exploits on behalf of the country, people, the era and history.
					
					 The Korean people could demonstrate the dignity of the country and nation at the highest level as they were holding Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il in high esteem, and the world is admiring Juche Korea dynamically advancing toward the final victory for the building of a thriving nation.
					
					 They expressed belief that the Korean people would achieve greater successes in carrying out the historic cause for the building of a thriving socialist nation and national reunification under the seasoned leadership of Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					 A letter to Kim Jong Un was adopted at the meeting.

articles.title: More Rallies Held to Congratulate Kim Jong Un
articles.content:
More Rallies Held to Congratulate Kim Jong Un
Pyongyang, April 12 (KCNA) -- More rallies took place in North Phyongan, North Hamgyong, Ryanggang and Kangwon provinces and Kaesong and Hoeryong cities and Jaeryong and Changsong counties and other cities and counties on Friday and Saturday to congratulate supreme leader Kim Jong Un on his reelection as first chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK.
					 Present there were officials of local party and power bodies and working people's organizations, working people from all walks of life and youth and students.
					
					 Reports were followed by speeches there.
					
					 The reporters and speakers said that the reelection of Kim Jong Un to the top post of the DPRK serves as the greatest fortune and glory of the Workers' Party of Korea and the army and people of the DPRK.
					
					 Kim Jong Un has wisely led the revolutionary struggle and the overall construction at the top posts of the party and state over the past two years, performing immortal exploits to go down in the history of the country, they noted.
					
					 They called on all the service personnel and people to fulfill their honorable mission and duties in the drive to realize beautiful dreams and ideals of the people, remaining loyal to the leadership of Kim Jong Un.
					
					 They stressed the need to perfectly carry out the plan and intention of Kim Jong Un in the shortest period and raise a strong wind for leap forward on all fronts for the building of a thriving nation.

articles.title: Picturesque Mangyong Hill
articles.content:
Picturesque Mangyong Hill
Pyongyang, April 12 (KCNA) -- With the approach of the Day of the Sun (April 15), the birthday of President Kim Il Sung, many people in the DPRK are visiting Mangyongdae, his birthplace in the city of Pyongyang.
					 In Mangyongdae there is a hill called Mangyong in Korean, which means that one can command a bird's-eye view of a myriad of landscapes.
					
					 On Mangyong Hill near the Taedong River there are such historic sites as Study Site, Wrestling Site and Spring Kim Il Sung had used in his childhood. Located at the foot of its southwestern part is his native home.
					
					 The hill is covered by ever-green pine trees and other various species of plants, including maple tree, fir, lilac, apricot, peach and azalea. In every April, it looks like a piece of painting with beautiful flowers in full bloom.
					
					 On the hill there is the Mangyongdae Pavilion, where visitors would get a bird's-eye view of natural sceneries in and around Mangyongdae as well as different parts of the city.

articles.title: Book "Among the People" Vol. 103 Published
articles.content:
Book "Among the People" Vol. 103 Published
Pyongyang, April 12 (KCNA) -- "Among the People" Vol. 103, a book of reminiscences, was brought out in the DPRK.
					 The book contains 18 reminiscences dealing with the undying feats and noble traits of President Kim Il Sung who made great contributions to the country and people, the era and revolution.
					
					 Reminiscences "'There Is No Precious Man like the Army Defending the Country'" tells the fact that the President took a benevolent step to build a soldiers' rest home for their health and life while energetically leading the building of regular army right after the liberation of Korea.
					
					 Reminiscences "In Those Days When Grasping Real Intention of Patriotism" deals with the fact that he unfolded a bright prospect for the reed research and production, giving teachings on cultivating reeds needed for settling the clothing issue of the people with high patriotism.
					
					 Contained in the book are reminiscences on the undying feats and fatherly love of the President, the brilliant commander of Mt. Paektu, who led the Fatherland Liberation War to victory.
					
					 There are also reminiscences on the wise leadership and great benevolence of the President who made tireless efforts to develop the country's economy and improve the standard of people's living.
					
					 Also edited in the book are reminiscences on the fact that he put forward the rising generation as the master of a farm, making young people aware of the importance of scientific farming and paying deep attention to the research to increase the grain production.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Slams Park Geun Hye's Reckless Remarks
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Slams Park Geun Hye's Reckless Remarks
Pyongyang, April 12 (KCNA) -- Park Geun Hye of south Korea at a recent meeting of senior secretaries of Chongwadae told this or that about laying the "foundation for peace and unification" unexpectedly, finding fault with the DPRK with outcries over "the north's breach of the promise to stop slandering and provoking each other" and "internal unrest".
					 Commenting on this, Rodong Sinmun Saturday says:
					
					 This is a revelation of the trick to pass the buck for tensions between the north and the south to the DPRK and carry out the confrontation policy at any cost. 
					
					 Referring to the fact that the south Korean authorities reneged on the north-south agreement, the commentary goes on:
					
					 Park Geun Hye talked about "internal unrest" of the north again. It reveals her ignorance and stupidity only. It is a product of the consciousness of her crisis. 
					
					 Afraid of the fact that people's criticism of the failure of its "policy toward the north" will lead to the defeat in the election to local self-governing bodies, the south Korean puppet group orchestrated such a poor farce to calm down the public criticism caused by the deteriorated north-south relations and divert the people's attention elsewhere. 
					
					 However, with no rhetoric can the south Korean authorities evade the responsibility for the grave situation in which the above-said agreement was totally breached.
					
					 Though Park is a master in confusing right and wrong, she can not deceive the people but pay dearly for her crimes.

articles.title: U.S.-S. Korea Combined Air Exercises under Fire
articles.content:
U.S.-S. Korea Combined Air Exercises under Fire
Pyongyang, April 12 (KCNA) -- The largest-ever Max Thunder combined air exercises aimed at mounting an overall air strike at the DPRK are being staged in the sky above south Korea from April 11 to 25 in the wake of the large-scale Ssangyong combined landing drill at a time when the provocative Foal Eagle has reached its climax.
					 It was also reported that Pacific Thunder, a war drill for search and rescue to be applied in contingency on the Korean peninsula will be staged between April 14 and 18.
					
					 The spokesman for the National Peace Committee of Korea in a statement on Saturday denounced the exercises as an undisguised challenge to all Koreans desirous of improved inter-Korean relations and peace and stability on the Korean peninsula and in Northeast Asia and public opinions at home and abroad as they are the dangerous war maneuvers aimed to mount a preemptive attack on the DPRK in their scale, contents and intensity from A to Z.
					
					 The statement said:
					
					 The U.S. and the south Korean puppet warmongers are staging Max Thunder in mid-April this year while Foal Eagle is under way though they did it in May last year. Max Thunder involves various types of planes, double the number of those mobilized for the previous drills, and it lasts longer than last year. This goes to clearly prove the provocative nature of the exercises.
					
					 No one can say when over 100 planes will mount a surprise attack on the DPRK with nuclear bombs and missiles.
					
					 The saber-rattling indicates that the scenario of the U.S. and the puppet group to invade the DPRK has already gone beyond the danger line and entered into a real action.
					
					 The U.S. and the puppet group are crying out for UN "sanctions" and kicking off a conspiratorial drone racket while taking issue with the DPRK over its regular rocket launching exercises and its steps for bolstering up self-defensive nuclear deterrence for no reason. Timed to coincide with this, they are staging the frantic Max Thunder as part of Foal Eagle in the wake of Key Resolve and Ssangyong combined landing drill aimed at "occupying Pyongyang". This goes to clearly prove that all these maneuvers are pursuant to the premeditated and deliberate scenario for a war against the DPRK.
					
					 While staging ceaseless war maneuvers against the DPRK with huge aggression forces involved, the U.S. and south Korean puppet forces are massively beefing up their aggressor forces on the peninsula and in its vicinity and threatening and blackmailing the DPRK by force of arms, making much fuss about its rocket launching exercises for self-defence and reported measure for a nuclear test for protecting the national dignity and the right to existence.  These moves bring to light their shameless and double-dealing nature.
					
					 This saber-rattling clearly indicates that "the nuclear and missile threats" from the DPRK touted by the U.S. are aimed to justify the U.S. nuclear war drills against the DPRK and disable its nuclear deterrence in a bid to realize the aggressive ambition at any cost. 
					
					 The saber-rattling made it clearer that the "Dresden initiative" and the like made by the south Korean puppet group is nothing but hypocrisy and a poor wordplay intended to realize its foolish daydream, pursuant to the U.S. scenario for war of aggression.
					
					 There take place military exercises in various countries and regions of the world but none of them is staged all the year round, going beyond the danger line with huge aggressor forces involved like what is happening in south Korea.
					
					 If the UN is to take an impartial action, it should take issue with the dangerous U.S.-south Korea war exercises being staged in the biggest hotspot in the world and condemn them, to begin with.
					
					 The army and people of the DPRK will never remain a passive onlooker to these reckless war drills. Should the enemies intrude into the inviolable territorial air of the DPRK even an inch, they will mercilessly wipe out the enemies and reduce to ashes not only the sortie bases but all their strongholds through deadly strikes. 
					
					 The U.S. and south Korean puppet forces will be held wholly accountable for the disastrous consequences to be entailed by this reckless saber-rattling.

articles.title: U.S. and S. Korean Warmongers Conduct Firing Drill
articles.content:
U.S. and S. Korean Warmongers Conduct Firing Drill
Pyongyang, April 12 (KCNA) -- The 25th Division of the U.S. imperialist aggression forces and the 26th Division of the south Korean puppet ground force staged a frantic combined live firing drill in Phochon, Kyonggi Province on Friday, according to south Korean Yonhap News.
					 The drill, part of the Foal Eagle joint military exercises targeting the DPRK, was conducted with the U.S. helicopter gunship OH-58D which were redeployed in south Korea last year, puppet army's tank K-1 and other war hardware involved.
					
					 The warmongers also staged a drill for occupying a position, air-support firing drill, etc., opening them to media.
					
					 Their war exercises aimed at invading the DPRK are escalating tensions on the Korean peninsula, arousing great indignation among all Koreans.

articles.title: S. Korean Warmongers Stage Combined Aerial Drill with U.S.
articles.content:
S. Korean Warmongers Stage Combined Aerial Drill with U.S.
Pyongyang, April 12 (KCNA) -- The puppet Air Force Operational Command of south Korea announced a plan to stage a combined aerial drill with U.S. Air Force in the sky all over south Korea for two weeks from April 11, according to south Korean MBC.
					 The U.S. imperialists and the south Korean war-like forces are going to stage the largest-ever war drill to strike the DPRK from the sky with more than 100 planes including fighters involved.
					
					 They are steadily expanding the scale of the joint military exercises to mount a preemptive attack on the DPRK in a bid to unleash a war on the Korean peninsula at any cost.

articles.title: South Korean Organizations Declare April 19 All-People Action
articles.content:
South Korean Organizations Declare April 19 All-People Action
Pyongyang, April 12 (KCNA) -- The Confederation of Trade Unions, the Federation of Peasants Associations, the Solidarity for Progress, the Federation of University Students and other organizations of south Korea held a press conference in Seoul on April 9 at which they declared April 19 all-people action, according to the south Korean internet paper Jaju Minbo.
					 In the press conference speakers condemned the Park Geun Hye regime for discharging with a decision of not guilty the very one who tried to conceal the case, shutting its eyes to the probe into the fraudulent election by the "government bodies".
					
					 If this is allowed, it is possible that the chief criminal of the election rigging will be declared not guilty, they charged. 
					
					 Even though it has been brought into bolder relief that power organs interfered in the election, the authorities faked up a spy case to conceal, distort and curtail the election rigging, they held.
					
					 They declared that they would launch a 100 000-people candlelight action on April 19 and wage an action to get the Park Geun Hye regime step down in the spirit of the April 19 Popular Uprising when the south Korean people forced the Syngman Rhee regime engrossed in election rigging to resign.

articles.title: Members of Railway Trade Union Launch Hunger Strike in S. Korea
articles.content:
Members of Railway Trade Union Launch Hunger Strike in S. Korea
Pyongyang, April 12 (KCNA) -- Members of Railway Trade Union in south Korea launched a hunger strike on Wednesday in protest against the management's suppression of the trade union, according to south Korean CBS.
					 They denounced the Railway Corporation for taking an inhumane retaliatory measure against more than 720 workers on Monday for the reason that they took part in strikes against the privatization of the railway service, and demanded an immediate stop to the suppression.
					
					 At dawn of the same day, 2 members of the branch of the Seoul Rolling-Stock Office under the Railway Trade Union staged a sit-in strike on top of a 45 meter-high steel tower.

articles.title: Day of Sun Celebrated in Russia
articles.content:
Day of Sun Celebrated in Russia
Moscow, April 10 (KCNA) -- A meeting was held by the Russian Association for Friendship and Cultural Cooperation with the DPRK on April 9 to celebrate the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung (Day of the Sun).
					 Displayed on the front wall of the meeting place were the portraits of smiling Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il.
					
					 On display there were works of Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il and supreme leader Kim Jong Un and books introducing Songun Korea and photos on the theme of "Eternal Day of the Sun".
					
					 Present there were personages of the association, the Russian Foreign Ministry, the Korean War Veterans' Council and the Korean Koryo Medical Centre.
					
					 Present there on invitation were staff members of the DPRK embassy in Moscow.
					
					 Petrov, chairman of the association and chairman of the preparatory committee of the Russian public for marking the Day of the Sun, made a report.
					
					 He said:
					
					 Kim Il Sung, born in Mangyongdae in the grim period of the Japanese imperialists' colonial rule over Korea, led the anti-Japanese armed struggle for a long period, liberated Korea and built a rich and prosperous socialist state in Korea.
					
					 He published many famous works, wisely led the Korean people in their struggle for socialist construction and national reunification and powerfully promoted the socialist movement and labor movement of the world.
					
					 The cause of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il will be successfully carried forward and accomplished thanks to Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Matsegora, vice department director of the Russian Foreign Ministry, Kramarenko, chairman of the war veterans' council, Zhukova, head of the Russian side to the medical center, and other speakers said that Kim Il Sung was a peerless patriot who devoted himself to the country and people all his life and the founder of socialist Korea who built the DPRK into an invincible power.
					
					 A congratulatory message to Kim Jong Un was adopted at the meeting.

articles.title: Day of Sun Celebrated in Romania, Serbia, Guinea
articles.content:
Day of Sun Celebrated in Romania, Serbia, Guinea
Pyongyang, April 12 (KCNA) -- A meeting took place in Romania and lectures were given in Serbia and Guinea on April 2 and 4 on the occasion of the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung (Day of the Sun).
					 Chairman of the Romanian Socialist Union Constantin Rotaru who is chairman of the preparatory committee for celebrating the Day of the Sun said that the President was a great leader and tender-hearted father who devoted all his life to the prosperity of the country and the happiness of the people.
					
					 He noted that the shining reality in the DPRK is thanks to the President who founded the great Juche idea and applied it to all fields.
					
					 Secretary General of the New Yugoslav Communist Party of Serbia Batric Mijovic, who is chairman of the preparatory committee for celebrating the Day of the Sun, said that Kim Il Sung's life was the one of the most outstanding statesman in the present times and his august name is throwing its rays together with the immortal Juche idea through centuries.
					
					 The vice-chairman of the Guinean Kimilsungia-Kimjongilia Association said that Kim Il Sung performed immortal exploits on behalf of the era and history, adding he will always live in the hearts of mankind.

articles.title: Day of Sun to Be Marked in Dominica
articles.content:
Day of Sun to Be Marked in Dominica
Pyongyang, April 12 (KCNA) -- A Dominican preparatory committee for celebrating the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung (Day of the Sun) was formed at the building of the United Left Movement of Dominica on April 7.
					 Jose Miguel Mejia, minister of the government of Dominica and secretary general of the party, in his speech at the inaugural meeting highly praised the President for performing the undying feats for the Korean revolution and the socialist movement of the world.
					
					 He informed the meeting of the work to be done by the preparatory committee.
					
					 He was elected chairman of the committee.

articles.title: Day of Sun Celebrated in Different Countries
articles.content:
Day of Sun Celebrated in Different Countries
Pyongyang, April 12 (KCNA) -- Events for celebrating the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung (Day of the Sun) took place in different countries.
					 Meetings, seminars, photo exhibitions and film shows were held in Myanmar, Mongolia, Indonesia and Germany between March 25 and 30.
					
					 Displayed at the venues of the events were photos dealing with the revolutionary lives and exploits of Generalissimos Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il and revolutionary activities of Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					 On display there were books and photos introducing proud successes achieved by the Korean people in building a thriving nation.
					
					 Films shown included Korean films documenting the immortal revolutionary lives and exploits of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il.
					
					 The director of a Myanmar research institute said in his speech that the venerable image of Kim Il Sung who made great contributions to the country and people will be cherished in the hearts of the Korean people and world progressive mankind forever.
					
					 Personages of the Mongolian Mt. Paektu Association for Independent Development, the Mongolian Politics and Business School and a Mongolian university said:
					
					 The Juche idea is recognized as the guiding idea of the human cause of independence. The world progressive people are finding the way out in the Juche idea now that the imperialists are intensifying their moves. The human cause of independence will dynamically advance under the banner of the Juche idea.
					
					 The director of the Unido Azidharma Industrial Company of Indonesia said that Kim Il Sung's exploits have been deeply cherished in the hearts of not only the Korean people but also the Indonesian people.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung's Work Published in Mexico
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung's Work Published in Mexico
Pyongyang, April 12 (KCNA) -- President Kim Il Sung's work "Let Us Uphold Independence" was published in booklet by the Publishing House of the Workers' Party of Mexico on April 7.
					 The work, made public on September 7, Juche 70 (1981), clarifies that it is the requirement of the present era to maintain independence in the activities of the party and the state and the Juche idea is a man-centered philosophy.

articles.title: Swiss Organizations Denounce UN's Accusation of DPRK's Rocket Launching Exercises
articles.content:
Swiss Organizations Denounce UN's Accusation of DPRK's Rocket Launching Exercises
Pyongyang, April 12 (KCNA) -- The Switzerland-Korea Committee and the Swiss Group for the Study of the Juche Idea issued a joint statement on Mar. 31 to criticize the UN for accusing the DPRK of its rocket launching exercises.
					 The statement said:
					
					 The UN Security Council committed an illegal provocation such as "denouncing" the DPRK's just rocket launching exercises as a "violation of resolutions" and "threat to the global peace and security" in a closed-door consultative meeting convened at the urgent request of the U.S. on Mar. 28.
					
					 For this illegal action the UNSC acted as a puppet of the U.S. once again.
					
					 The Korean People's Army conducted the rocket launching exercises to protect the country from the U.S. nuclear war exercises for aggression.
					
					 On the other hand the UN has kept silence over the U.S.-south Korea Ssangyong drill chiefly aimed at "occupying Pyongyang".
					
					 The UN "denounced" the DPRK's efforts for the security of the country and nation as a "provocation" whereas justified the U.S. moves for a nuclear war as the ones for "defending peace". This is the height of shamelessness.
					
					 It is the exercise of the legitimate and just right for the DPRK to take measures to defend its sovereignty.
					
					 The U.S. is not entitled to commit moves for aggression to threaten the security of the DPRK.
					
					 If the U.S. takes issue with the DPRK over its self-defensive measures as a "provocation" again, the DPRK will not rule out a new type of nuclear test.
					
					 This is a legitimate act for self-defence and will not pose any threat to other country.

articles.title: Romanian Political Party Denounces Japan's Crackdown on Chongryon
articles.content:
Romanian Political Party Denounces Japan's Crackdown on Chongryon
Pyongyang, April 12 (KCNA) -- The Romanian Socialist Union issued a statement on April 7 denouncing the Japanese authorities' crackdown on Chongryon (General Association of Korean Residents in Japan).
					 The statement said:
					
					 Shortly ago, the Japanese authorities made an illegal decision on allowing the sale of the land and building of the Korean Hall of Chongryon as part of their politically-motivated crackdown on Chongryon, a dignified overseas citizens organization of the DPRK, and the moves to stifle it.
					
					 To ensure the rights and interests of the Koreans in Japan is a due state obligation of Japan and its legal and moral responsibility.
					
					 The Korean Hall of Chongryon has played a role of the diplomatic mission of the DPRK for the DPRK-Japan friendship and peace in Northeast Asia under the condition that there are no diplomatic relations between the two countries.
					
					 The Japanese authorities are becoming all the more pronounced in their moves to crack down on Chongryon, far from making an apology and reparation for fabulous manpower and material damage done to Korea. This is a grave provocation against the DPRK.
					
					 The Romanian Socialist Union resolutely denounces the Japanese authorities for violating the rights and dignity of the Koreans in Japan.
					
					 The Japanese authorities should bear in mind that the suppression of Chongryon and the Koreans in Japan is leading the DPRK-Japan relations to a catastrophe.

articles.title: Organizations of DR Congo, Iran Denounce Japan for Moves to Seize Korean Hall
articles.content:
Organizations of DR Congo, Iran Denounce Japan for Moves to Seize Korean Hall
Pyongyang, April 12 (KCNA) -- Organizations of DR Congo and Iran made public statements on April 3 and 6 in denunciation of the Japanese authorities' moves to suppress the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan (Chongryon). 
					 The Working Citizens' Association of DR Congo said:
					
					 The Korean Hall is the center of activities of Chongryon for ensuring rights and interests of Koreans in Japan and it has fulfilled the duty like the diplomatic mission of the DPRK under the condition that there are no diplomatic ties between the DPRK and Japan. 
					
					 However, the Japanese authorities have long regarded the Korean Hall as a thorn in their flesh and ceaselessly suppressed Chongryon and are now trying to illegally seize the hall. 
					
					 The Japanese authorities should stop at once such a mean move. 
					
					 Japan should bear in mind that it is the country which imposed all sorts of misfortunes and sufferings upon the Korean people in the past, make a sincere apology for the disgraceful past and stop discriminating Koreans in Japan. 
					
					 We call upon world progressives loving justice and truth not to remain a passive onlooker to Japan's anachronistic anti-Chongryon moves but to actively turn out in the drive against the Japanese authorities' criminal act. 
					
					 The Iranian Workers' House stated as follows:
					
					 We thoroughly reject the illegal decision made by the Tokyo District Court under the manipulation of the Japanese authorities. 
					
					 The Japanese authorities' behavior is a wanton violation of the dignity of Chongryon and Koreans in Japan and a grave infringement on the sovereignty of the DPRK. 
					
					 We demand the Japanese authorities immediately stop the moves to seize the Korean Hall of Chongryon.

articles.title: Japan's Suppression of Chongryon Protested in South Africa, Austria
articles.content:
Japan's Suppression of Chongryon Protested in South Africa, Austria
Pyongyang, April 12 (KCNA) -- A political party of South Africa and an organization of Austria strongly protested against the Japanese authorities' suppression of Chongryon (General Association of Korean Residents in Japan).
					 The Mfumalanga Provincial Committee of the South African Communist Party in a letter sent to the Japanese authorities on April 7 said that the decision to allow the sale of the land and building of the Korean Hall of Chongryon proved that the Japanese authorities' suppression of the Koreans in Japan has reached a very extreme phase.
					
					 It went on:
					
					 The court, which is called a supervisor of law execution in Japan styling itself a so-called "law governing state," abandoned its mission and made a "decision" for an unprecedented swindle in disregard of the Japanese law, judicial precedent of the court and practices of the auction procedures. This goes to clearly prove that it is none other than the present authorities of Japan who masterminded the decision.
					
					 Their illegal decision is a wanton violation of the dignity and vital rights of Chongryon and Koreans in Japan and a grave encroachment upon the sovereignty of the DPRK.
					
					 The Japanese authorities should stop their suppression of Chongryon and Koreans in Japan at once.
					
					 An Austrian organization said in a letter sent to the Japanese embassy in Vienna on April 6:
					
					 We urge the Japanese authorities to ensure the rights of the Koreans in Japan.
					
					 The Japanese authorities are trying to seize the Korean Hall of Chongryon.
					
					 This is aimed to stamp out the movement of the Koreans in Japan.
					
					 We urge the Japanese authorities to stop their suppression of the Koreans in Japan.

articles.title: Japanese Authorities' Decision Denounced by Peruvian Political Party
articles.content:
Japanese Authorities' Decision Denounced by Peruvian Political Party
Pyongyang, April 12 (KCNA) -- The Peruvian National Independent Movement for Free Votingâ€™s Union released a statement on April 5 denouncing the Japanese authorities for cracking down on Chongryon (General Association of Korean Residents in Japan).
					 The statement said:
					
					 The Tokyo District Court made a decision on allowing the sale of the land and building of the Korean Hall of Chongryon under the manipulation of the Japanese authorities.
					
					 Chongryon is a full-fledged overseas citizens organization of the DPRK which has long been recognized worldwide.
					
					 The Japanese reactionaries have steadily maneuvered to stamp out Chongryon.
					
					 To sell the land and building of the hall as they please is a grave infringement on the sovereignty of the DPRK from A to Z.
					
					 Their act is the extension of their ceaseless hostile policy toward the DPRK.
					
					 We firmly denounce their illegal act against the DPRK and Chongryon.
					
					 We extend full support and solidarity to the Korean people in their struggle to defend the sovereignty of the country and the rights of the overseas Koreans.

articles.title: CNCDP denuncia entrenamiento combinado aereo EE.UU.-Sur de Corea
articles.content:
CNCDP denuncia entrenamiento combinado aereo EE.UU.-Sur de Corea
Pyongyang, 12 de abril (ACNC) -- Junto con los ejercicios conjuntos militares Foal Eagle y el entrenamiento de desembarco combinado Ssangryong se desarrollan del dia 11 al 25 en toda la extension surcoreana el simulacro combinado aereo "Max Thunder" de gran envergadura sin precedentes suponiendo el ataque aereo contra la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea.
					Segun trascendidos, del dia 14 al 18, se libraran "Pacific Thunder", entrenamiento de exploracion y socorro a ser aplicadas en el tiempo emergente de la Peninsula Coreana.
					
					En su declaracion publicada el dia 12, el portavoz del Comite Nacional Coreano por la Defensa de la Paz los califico de un simulacro peligroso de guerra de agresion  suponiendo el ataque preventivo contra la RPDC y de un desafio abierto a todos los coreanos y la opinion publica interna y externa que desean la mejora de las relaciones intercoreanas y la paz y la estabilidad de la Peninsula Coreana y el resto del Nordeste de Asia.
					
					Hasta el ano pasado, EE.UU. y los belicistas surcoreanos libraron en mayo "Max Thunder", pero, este ano, lo desarrollan en abril junto con los ejercicios militares conjuntos prolongando mas los dias de entrenamiento y movilizando los  aviones de diversos tipos dos veces mas que antes, lo que comprueba el caracter agresivo del actual simulacro, subrayo el portavoz y continuo:
					
					Nadie sabra cuando emprenderan mas de 100 aviones el ataque sorpresivo para lanzar bombas y misiles nucleares contra la RPDC.
					
					El actual entrenamiento demuestra que la intriga de EE.UU. y la banda titere para agredir la RPDC paso el limite peligroso y entro en la etapa de guerra real.
					
					Y prueba claramente que todos los ejercicios militares arriba mencionados se desarrollan segun el guion provocativo trazado de manera planificada e intencional para encender el fuego en la mecha de la guerra de agresion contra la RPDC.
					
					EE.UU. y la camarilla titere surcoreana, que libran de continuo los ejercicios belicos de agresion al Norte de Corea movilizando enormes fuerzas armadas, arman revuelo por el entrenamiento de lanzamiento de cohetes para la autodefensa de la RPDC y el anuncio de la prueba nuclear para la defensa de la dignidad y derecho a la existencia de la nacion y aumentan en la Peninsula Coreana y su contorno las fuerzas agresoras amenazando militarmente a la RPDC. Esto revela el cinismo y la dualidad de ellos mismos.
					
					Las presentes maniobras provocativas evidenciaron que EE.UU. habla tanto de la "amenaza nuclear y de misiles" de alguien para justificar sus maniobras de guerra nuclear anti-RPDC y realizar a toda costa su ambicion de agredirla al neutralizar el disuasivo nuclear.
					
					Ademas, se hizo claro que el "proyecto de Dresden" y otros dichos de la banda surcoreana no pasan de ser un engano y charlataneria para realizar su malsana ambicion adhiriendose a la campana de guerra agresiva de EE.UU.
					
					Aunque se libran los ejercicios militares en varios paises y regiones del mundo, no hay ningun lugar comparable con el Sur de Corea donde se despliegan a lo largo del ano los simularos de guerra con la incorporacion de enormes fuerzas agresoras sobrepasando el limite alarmante.
					
					Si la ONU respeta la imparcialidad, debe cuestionar y condenar primero esos peligrosisimos entrenamientos de guerra que libran EE.UU. y los titeres surcoreanos en la zona mas candente del mundo.
					
					Los uniformados y habitantes de la RPDC no estaran con brazos cruzados ante las imprudentes tentativas de provocacion de guerra de EE.UU. y los titeres surcoreanos.
					
					Si los enemigos se atreven a invadir, aunque una pulgada, el sagrado cielo jurisdiccional de la RPDC, los aniquilaran sin piedad y destruiran con un fuego temible las bases de despegue de los piratas aereos y los demas bastiones enemigos.
					
					La responsabilidad sobre la situacion catastrofica, que se produzca debido a los imprudentes ejercicios belicos, recaera totalmente sobre EE.UU. y la camarilla titere surcoreana.

articles.title: Delegado coreano expone posicion de RPDC sobre amenaza y chantaje nucleares de EE.UU.
articles.content:
Delegado coreano expone posicion de RPDC sobre amenaza y chantaje nucleares de EE.UU.
Pyongyang, 12 de abril (ACNC) -- Al hacer uso de la palabra en la reunion anual de la Comision de Desarme de la ONU, sesionada el dia 7, el delegado coreano denuncio que Estados Unidos., primer fabricante, usuario y portador de armas nucleares del mundo, esta dando mas acicate a la modernizacion de esos artefactos cautivado de su ambicion anacronica. 
					Al reiterar la insistencia de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea en la cancelacion de todas las armas nucleares existentes en el globo terraqueo, el apunto que eso es posible solo cuando el primer poseedor de armas nucleares del mundo siente el ejemplo de ponerse al frente de desarme nuclear suspendiendo la modernizacion de armas nucleares y el despliegue del sistema antimisiles. 
					
					Hoy dia, la situacion de la Peninsula Coreana evidencia que llegan a la etapa mas grave la politica hostil y la amenaza y chantaje nucleares anti-RPDC de EE.UU., dijo y expuso la siguiente posicion de la RPDC:
					
					Primero, EE.UU. debe parar ahora mismo en la Peninsula Coreana los ejercicios militares conjuntos, penetrados de la amenaza y chantaje nucleares de toda indole contra la RPDC. 
					
					Segundo, EE.UU. no debe describir injustamente como "provocacion" y "amenaza" las contramedidas de autodefensa de la RPDC frente a la amenaza y chantaje. 
					
					La delegacion de la RPDC espera que la presente cita preste atencion especial a la brutal amenaza y chantaje nuclear que ejerce sobre la RPDC por mas de 60 anos el primer poseedor de armas nucleares del mundo. 
					
					Proseguiran los esfuerzos de la RPDC por la desnuclearizacion de la Peninsula Coreana dando enfoque a acabar con la amenaza y chantaje nucleares de EE.UU.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un recibe felicitaciones de presidente ugandes
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un recibe felicitaciones de presidente ugandes
Pyongyang, 12 de abril (ACNC) -- El Mariscal Kim Jong Un, Primer Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, recibio un mensaje de felicitacion que le enviara el 26 de marzo el presidente de la Republica de Uganda, Yoweri Kaguta Museveni. 
					La misiva senala: 
					
					En ocasion del 102o aniversario de natalicio de Su Excelencia Kim Il Sung, gran lider del pueblo coreano, quisiera extender a Su Excelencia, al gobierno y al pueblo de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, las mas calidas felicitaciones en nombre del gobierno y pueblo de la Republica de Uganda y en el mio propio. 
					
					El gran Lider se abnego durante toda su vida por la prosperidad y el desarrollo socioeconomico de vuestro pais. 
					
					Apreciamos altamente la vida y las grandes hazanas de Su Excelencia Kim Il Sung, gran lider, y deseamos que sigan desarrollandose favorablemente las excelentes relaciones bilaterales con Su Excelencia, el gobierno y pueblo de vuestro pais. 
					
					Formulamos votos por buena salud de Su Excelencia y por la prosperidad sostenible del pueblo coreano.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un recibe felicitaciones del politico de Tadjikistan
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un recibe felicitaciones del politico de Tadjikistan
Pyongyang, 12 de abril (ACNC) -- El Mariscal Kim Jong Un, Primer Secretario del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, recibio un mensaje de felicitacion que le enviara el dia 8 el presidente del Partido Comunista de Tadjikistan y miembro de la Camara de Representantes de la Republica de Tadjikistan, Sh. Shabdolov.
					La misiva sigue: 
					
					Con motivo del 102o aniversario de natalicio del camarada Kim Il Sung, eterno Presidente de Corea y Lider del pueblo coreano, el Comite Central del Partido Comunista de Tadjikistan envia sinceras felicitaciones a Vd. y a todo el pueblo coreano. 
					
					Para los militantes del nuestro partido, toda la vida del gran camarada Kim Il Sung es un ejemplo de la lucha revolucionaria por la felicidad de los pueblos trabajadores y por el triunfo del socialismo. 
					
					El trayecto de actividades revolucionarias del camarada Kim Il Sung comprobo que los paises no grandes tambien pueden ser liberados desde la opresion de los imperialistas mundiales, encabezados por Estados Unidos, en el curso de la lucha por el socialismo. 
					
					Garantizan la victoria en esta lucha la firme unidad y la conviccion revolucionaria del pueblo guiado por el gran lider, identico al camarada Kim Il Sung. 
					
					Camarada Kim Jong Un,
					
					Nosotros, los militantes del Partido Comunista de Tadjikistan, le deseamos de todo corazon exitos en esa lucha.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un recibe mensaje de felicitacion del presidente de Myanmar
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un recibe mensaje de felicitacion del presidente de Myanmar
Pyongyang, 12 de abril (ACNC) -- El Mariscal Kim Jong Un, Primer Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, recibio un mensaje de felicitacion que le enviara el dia 4 el presidente de Myanmar, Thein Sein. 
					El texto va como sigue: 
					
					Con motivo del jubiloso 15 de abril, 102o aniversario del natalicio de Su Excelencia Kim Il Sung, eterno Presidente de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, extiendo sinceras y cordiales felicitaciones a Su Excelencia y por su conducto, al pueblo de la RPDC. 
					
					Aprovecho esta oportunidad para desearle de todo corazon a Su Excelencia buena salud y felicidad, y a la RPDC, el progreso y prosperidad continuos.

articles.title: Portavoz del CDN presenta la opinion de RPDC sobre 3 propuestas de Park Geun-hye
articles.content:
Portavoz del CDN presenta la opinion de RPDC sobre 3 propuestas de Park Geun-hye
Pyongyang, 12 de abril (ACNC) -- Park Geun-hye publico en Dresden de Alemania las llamadas "tres propuestas sobre el Norte de Corea" recogiendo expresiones baratijas como "solucion del problema humanitario", el "establecimiento de la base de la vida del pueblo para la coprosperidad", la "recuperacion de homogeneidad", etc.
					Las autoridades surcoreanas expresan su necia posicion de que la RPDC acepte la "Declaracion de Dresden" que no vale la pena discutir.
					
					Al respecto, el portavoz del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea publico el dia 12 una declaracion que expone la opinion y la posicion de principios de la RPDC.
					
					El texto de la nota sigue:
					
					Primero, la "Declaracion de Dresden" es la chismografia de la traidora a la nacion que actuo con bajeza planteando los asuntos internos de la nacion hasta en el extranjero.
					
					Park exhorto en el extranjero a resolver los problemas vinculados con el destino del territorio nacional dividido en dos partes y la nacion separada por las fuerzas foraneas y abogo por lograr la "unificacion" de la Peninsula Coreana siguiendo el ejemplo de "unificacion entre el devorado y el devorador", lo cual es una ilusion absurda y locura.
					
					Segundo, la "Declaracion de Dresden" es disparate de la opositora a la reunificacion quien enturbio la opinion publica con hipocresia y engano sin presentar ninguna solucion debido a su ignorancia de la situacion actual de las relaciones Norte-Sur.
					
					Las "tres propuestas sobre el Norte de Corea", mencionadas en la "declaracion", son cosas secundarias y triviales que distan mucho de la mejora y desarrollo de las relaciones N-S.
					
					En cuanto al parrafo sobre la solucion del problema humanitario, se dice que es posible construir la "confianza" entre el Norte y el Sur al "regularizar" el encuentro de familiares y parientes separados y abrir el "futuro de unificacion" mediante la "ayuda nutricional a las parturientas y bebes" junto con la sociedad internacional.
					
					Para mencionar la unificacion pacifica, aunque tardiamente, Park Geun-hye debio estudiar primero cuales son los problemas que han de ser resueltos antes y despues en las relaciones N-S.
					
					Ella dijo como si la primera tarea de mejora de las relaciones N-S fuera la supuesta "coprosperidad", basada en la "ayuda" y "colaboracion" de la sociedad internacional, y la "recuperacion de homogeneidad" a traves del "intercambio".  Asi demostro por si sola que ella es analfabeta y torpe en la politica y ciega incapaz de justipreciar la realidad.  
					
					El problema es que al referirse a la "asistencia", "cooperacion" e "intercambio", ella calumnio acaloradamente a la RPDC inventando cosas inexistentes como "sufrimientos" y "hambre" de alguien.
					
					Tercero, la "Declaracion de Dresden" es el sofisma anti-reunificacion pronunciado para elevar su infima popularidad haciendo vista gorda de los intereses del pais y la nacion.
					
					La "Declaracion de Dresden", que habria sido mejor si no fuese publicada, es el residuo de la epoca, caracterizado por la traicion a la nacion, la hipocresia y la naturaleza anti-reunificacion.
					
					Puesto que las autoridades surcoreanas demandaron la posicion oficial de la RPDC sobre la "Declaracion de Dresden", aprovechamos esta oportunidad para exponer nuestra posicion de principios como sigue:
					
					Hay que saber que la primera causa de la agravacion de relaciones intercoreanas y del enturbiamiento de futuro nacional es la boca de la misma Park Geun-hye.
					
					La opinion publica coincide en que si no se abre la fea boca de ella, calificada de ventana de todos los desastres, las relaciones N-S seran mejores que ahora.
					
					Park debe dejar de usar el desgastado cartel de "confianza" como cortina para encubrir su malsana intencion.
					
					Especificamente, esa palabra no debe ser malempleada como velo para disimular el intento de crear la desconfianza e inculcar la confrontacion y enganar a la nacion.
					
					Ademas, hay que poner punto final al pensamiento y acto anacronicos que se atienen al pasado tenebroso.
					
					No hay la conducta mas absurda y ridicula que reeditar el pasado ignominioso teniendo nostalgia de Yusin (renovacion).
					
					Sobre todo, no debe hablar en cada oportunidad del "milagro del rio Han" y de "aquel tiempo cuando se sento la solida base de desarrollo economico" para elogiar con rodeos el mandato de su padre.
					
					Al contrario, sera mejor aprender nuevamente la leccion de la muerte tragica que sufrio el por haber acabado con la democracia y practicado la dictadura de Yusin.
					
					Park Geun-hye debe conocer bien que si sigue actuando como ahora, puede convertir a Chongwadae (casa azul) en su tumba durante su mandato y ser condenada a la horca despues de su salida del poder.
					
					Le convendria mas para mantener su precaria vida hacer cosas, que avengan a los intereses del pais y la nacion, en lugar de malgastar el tiempo en tonterias.

articles.title: ACNC critica conversaciones tripartitas EE.UU.-Japon-Sur de Corea
articles.content:
ACNC critica conversaciones tripartitas EE.UU.-Japon-Sur de Corea
Pyongyang, 12 de abril (ACNC) -- Tuvieron lugar el dia pasado 7 en Washington las conversaciones tripartitas de los jefes de las conversaciones a 6 bandas de la parte norteamericana, japonesa y surcoreana.
					En esa ocasion ellos urgieron a la RPDC a "cesar las acciones amenazantes" y conspiraron la "cooperacion continua con los paises aliados y los acompanantes de la comunidad internacional para inquirir la responsabilidad de la RPDC sobre la violacion de DDHH, acusandola de "problema de DDHH".
					
					EE.UU. suele organizar tales conversaciones tripartitas para detener la disputa entre Japon y el Sur de Corea, aliados principales en la region de Asia-Pacifico y fortalecer el sistema de cooperacion tripartita.
					
					Para reconciliar a sus inferiores aliados EE.UU. somete a la consideracion de las conversaciones tripartitas el problema de la RPDC.
					
					EE.UU. toma como primer aparato el fortalecimiento de cooperacion entre sus aliados de la region en realizar su estrategia de dar primacia al Asia-Pacifico.
					
					Para controlarlos mas fuerte y crear el pretexto para aumentar de continuo sus fuerzas militares EE.UU. mantiene intencionalmente la circulacion viciosa de la tension de la situacion de la Peninsula Coreana, mientras da publicidad por todos los medios como si tuviera la RPDC la responsabilidad por el respecto.
					
					Pero, las acciones del imperio que niega los dialogos y agrava premeditadamente la situacion empujan la evolucion de la situacion de la Peninsula Coreana hacia la direccion contraria a la desnuclearizacion.
					
					En el caso de que en el futuro la desnuclearizacion de la Peninsula Coreana sufra mas la detencion y vicisitudes, su responsabilidad recaera enteramente sobre EE.UU.
